summary: Set in the late fifties in Denmark the poor junk yard assistant Harry inherits some money. He decides to use the money to hire a butler. The butler isn't too keen on the job at first, but ... See full summary »
cast: Osvald Helmuth|Ebbe Rode|Gunnar Lauring|Henning Moritzen|Lise Ringheim|Lily Broberg|Olaf Ussing|Palle Kirk|Aage Fønss|Ejner Federspiel|Einar Reim|Ernst Schou|Emil Halberg|Johannes Krogsgaard|Valsø Holm|Kirsten Jacobsen|Aage Winther-Jørgensen|Thecla Boesen|Ejnar Flach|Ejnar Hans Jensen|Carl Jønsson|John Kristian
title: Harry og kammertjeneren
